EmailTemplate.name: Maximizing the Use of Your Sweet-Billing Reports - Part 2_Sept_29_2011.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Tomorrow - Sept 29: Maximizing Your Sweet Billing Reports - Part 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Upcoming Webinar Reminder Maximizing the Use of Your Sweet Billing Reports - Part 2
This is a webinar reminder that you are registered for the upcoming webinar: Maximizing the Use of Your Sweet Billing Reports - Part 2 on Thursday, September 29th at 2 pm Eastern Time (1 pm CT | Noon MT | 11 am PT).
Your Presenters: Larry Cole and Michele Duwe, TriTech's EMS Solutions Sales Team
In this upcoming webinar, you'll learn about the Sweet Billing Flex Report Generator.
Join Link: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/ssjhzyb
Date: Thursday, September 29, 2011
Time: 2 pm Eastern Time (1 pm CT | Noon MT | 11 am PT)
Audio: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to a toll number on your screen when you log in
Trouble logging in? Call 800-799-4510 to the iLinc support team for help
Questions? Contact Cheri Lane, TriTech's Marketing Communication Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com
